DOC.brief_title: AngioSculpt Scoring Balloon Catheter For Bifurcation Coronary Lesions ( ABC Study )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose AngioSculpt® Scoring Balloon Catheter For Bifurcation Coronary lesion ( ABC registry ) demonstrate acute procedural success , device performance long term outcome associate use AngioSculpt Scoring Balloon Catheter ( AngioScore , Inc. , Fremont , CA ) lesion preparation treatment bifurcation lesion native coronary artery
DOC.criteria: Patients significant ( ≥ 50 % diameter stenosis ) native coronary artery disease involve bifurcation ( Medina class ( x , x,1 ) ) . Concomitant use Rotablator , Cutting Balloon , investigational coronary device . Additional plan coronary intervention nontarget lesion within 30 day study procedure .
